name: System Owner/User Discovery via dscl
description: Detects execution of the dscl utility used to retrieve user or directory information on macOS, which may indicate system owner or user enumeration activity.
query: aul.processImagePath:"dscl" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve User by ID")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate administrative user lookups or directory service operations

name: System Information Discovery via scutil
description: Detects execution of the macOS scutil command used to query or modify system configuration, such as hostnames or network settings, indicating possible system information discovery activity
query: aul.processImagePath:"scutil" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve User By ID")
author: Eram
false_positives: Normal administrative or network configuration queries (e.g., checking DNS or hostname)

name: System Information Discovery via sw_vers
description: Detects execution of /usr/bin/sw_vers and AUL event messages that contain OS product/version/build strings
query: aul.processImagePath:"sw_vers" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve User By ID")
author: Eram
false_positives: Inventory or orchestration tools (patching, MDM) that run sw_vers for legitimate inventory
Admin scripts run for troubleshooting or support

name: File and Directory Discovery via mdfind
description: Detects potential file and directory discovery behavior performed via `mdfind`.
query: aul.processImagePath:"mdfind" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve User by ID")
author: june0320
false_positives: Normal Spotlight metadata searches performed by system or user
Applications invoking metadata lookups internally

name: System Network Configuration Discovery via ipconfig getiflist
description: Detects execution of the 'ipconfig' utility on macOS, which may be used by adversaries to enumerate network configuration details such as IP address, DHCP settings, or DNS information.
query: aul.processImagePath:"opendirectoryd" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.opendirectoryd" AND aul.formatString:"%{public}s RPC: %{public}s, Module: %{public}@, %{public}@" AND (aul.eventMessage:"PROC: ipconfig")
author: Eram
false_positives: Normal system network diagnostics or DHCP troubleshooting
Administrative scripts querying IP information

name: File and Directory Discovery via ls
description: Detects the execution of the 'ls -la' command, which may be used by adversaries to enumerate files and directories on macOS systems.
query: aul.processImagePath:"ls" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve User By ID")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate system administrator or user enumeration commands executed manually
Normal shell operations listing directory contents

name: Application Window Discovery
description: A technique where adversaries enumerate running applications or open windows to gather information about user activity or identify security tools.
query: aul.processImagePath:"tccd" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.TCC" AND aul.formatString:"requestor: %{public}@ is checking access for accessor %{public}@" AND (aul.eventMessage:"requestor: TCCDProcess: identifier=com.apple.WindowServer" AND aul.eventMessage:"accessor TCCDProcess: identifier=com.apple.osascript")
author: EunJunPark
false_positives: test

name: Network Share Discovery via sharing
description: Detects usage of the macOS 'sharing' utility to query or configure network share settings, which may indicate attempts to enumerate or manipulate shared resources.
query: aul.processImagePath:"sharing" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve User by ID")
author: Eram
false_positives: legitimate configuration of macOS file/printer sharing by administrators or users
system preference changes via GUI (System Settings → Sharing)

name: System Network Connections Discovery via lsof
description: Detects usage of the macOS built-in utility 'lsof' to enumerate active network connections and listening ports, which may indicate system network discovery activity (MITRE ATT&CK T1049).
query: aul.processImagePath:"lsof" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve User by ID")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate administrative network troubleshooting or inventory collection (IT support, monitoring scripts, or MDM agents)

name: Remote System Discovery via netstat
description: Detects execution of netstat on macOS which may indicate host/route/connection discovery activity used for lateral movement reconnaissance.
query: aul.processImagePath:"netstat" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve service by port")
author: Eram
false_positives: legitimate network troubleshooting or monitoring by system administrators or scheduled monitoring tools.
automated system diagnostics and inventory jobs.

name: System Time Discovery via systemsetup
description: Detects execution of systemsetup on macOS to enumerate or query system time / network time settings which may indicate discovery activity.
query: aul.processImagePath:"systemsetup" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.xpc" AND aul.formatString:"[%p] invalidated because the current process cancelled the connection by calling xpc_connection_cancel()" AND (aul.eventMessage:"invalidated because the current process cancelled the connection by calling xpc_connection_cancel()")
author: Eram
false_positives: normal administrative or monitoring activities (time sync checks, scheduled audits).
configuration management and inventory tools.

name: Security Software Discovery via pkgutil
description: Detect invocation of macOS pkgutil which may be used for software discovery or enumeration. Matches Apple Unified Logging events where pkgutil executed or logged. Tune for legitimate admin activity.
query: aul.processImagePath:"pkgutil" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve User by ID")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate administrative inventory or packaging operations (managed software installs, MDM, devops automation).

name: File and Directory Discovery via find
description: Detects macOS System Policy (Sandbox) denial events caused by the find command when attempting to read protected files or directories.
query: aul.processImagePath:"kernel" AND aul.formatString:"%s" AND (aul.eventMessage:"System Policy: find" AND aul.eventMessage:"duplicate")
author: june0320
false_positives: Legitimate find usage scanning protected directories

name: Account Discovery via dscl
description: A technique where adversaries enumerate valid accounts, usernames, or permissions on a system to identify targets for subsequent attacks like brute force or phishing.
query: aul.processImagePath:"dscl" AND (aul.eventMessage:"*uerying records from directories*")
author: EunJunPark

name: Video Capture
description: Detects the act of recording the screen through the screencapture process.
query: aul.processImagePath:"screencapture" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.screencapture" AND aul.formatString:"didFinishRecording: No trim finish. duration: %fs size: %lld, error: %{public}s" AND (aul.eventMessage:"error: nil")
author: Eram
false_positives: Common user tasks (e.g., recording the screen using the command+shift+5 command)

name: Automated Collection via cp
description: Detects automated data collection activity where files are staged in a single location before exfiltration. The logs used by this rule are generated when sensitive files are accessed, so it cannot detect compression or copying of ordinary files.
query: aul.processImagePath:"tccd" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.TCC" AND aul.formatString:"AttributionChain: %{public}@" AND (aul.eventMessage:"accessing={TCCDProcess: identifier=com.apple.cp")
author: Eram
false_positives: Common user tasks (e.g., cp command)

name: Data Staged via zip
description: Collect your data in one place before you leak it. (The logs used by this rule are generated when sensitive files are accessed, so it cannot detect compression of ordinary files.)
query: aul.processImagePath:"kernel" AND (aul.eventMessage:"zip" AND aul.eventMessage:"file-read-data")
author: Eram
false_positives: Common user tasks (e.g., zip command)

name: Screen Capture
description: Detects the act of capturing the screen through the screencapture process.
query: aul.processImagePath:"screencapture" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.screencapture" AND aul.formatString:" Capturing image" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Capturing image")
author: Eram
false_positives: Common user tasks (e.g., capturing the screen using the command+shift+3 command)

name: Archive Collected Data via hdiutil
description: Collect your data in one place before you leak it.
query:
aul.processImagePath:"kernel" AND aul.formatString:"%s:%d: %s No ER state object for volume %s - rolling is not happening, nothing to recover.
" AND (aul.eventMessage:"*er_state_obj_get_for_recovery*")
author: Eram
false_positives: Common user tasks (e.g., hdiutil command)

name: Clipboard Data
description: Detects when data in the clipboard is pasted.
query: aul.processImagePath:"pboard" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.CFPasteboard" AND aul.formatString:"Handling %{public}s message" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Handling com.apple.pboard.paste-general-notification message")
author: Eram
false_positives: Common user tasks (e.g., ctrl + v)

name: Input Capture
description: Detects processes requesting global input capture via tccd (kTCCServiceListenEvent), which is indicative of potential keylogging or input-monitoring activity on macOS.
query: aul.subsystem:"com.apple.TCC" AND aul.formatString:"SEND: %d/%d %{public}s to %{public}s: request: %{public}s" AND (aul.eventMessage:"asynchronous to com.apple.tccd.system: request:" AND aul.eventMessage:"function=TCCAccessRequest, service=kTCCServiceListenEvent,")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate applications requesting accessibility/input monitoring

name: Data Staged via itto
description: diito를 이용한 파일 압축
query: aul.processImagePath:"ditto" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve User by ID")
author: EunJunPark

name: Account Manipulation via dscl
description: Detects opendirectoryd refreshing its cache for the local 'admin' group. This is often a result of group membership changes, such as through dscl.
query: aul.processImagePath:"opendirectoryd" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.opendirectoryd" AND aul.formatString:"refreshing: libinfo, reason: %{public}@, %{public,odtypes:mbr_details}.*P" AND (aul.eventMessage:"refreshing: libinfo, reason: required, group: admin@\/Local\/Default")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate system administrator actions changing group membership.
System updates or software installations/uninstallations causing the group cache to be refreshed.

name: Code Signing via codesign
description: Detects execution of the macOS codesign utility performing signature verification, indicating potential code signing or trust control subversion activity.
query: aul.processImagePath:"codesign" AND (aul.eventMessage:"SecKeyVerifySignature")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate developer code signing or verification operations
macOS system-level validation (e.g., Gatekeeper, notarization)

name: Disable or Modify Tools via spctl
description: Execution of `spctl --master-disable` disables Gatekeeper, allowing unsigned or unverified applications to run, thereby weakening macOS's built-in security controls.
query: aul.processImagePath:"spctl" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.xpc" AND aul.formatString:"[%p] %{public}s connection: mach=%{bool}d listener=%{bool}d peer=%{bool}d name=%{public}s" AND (aul.eventMessage:"activating connection: mach=true listener=false peer=false name=com.apple.security.syspolicy.exec")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate administrative use of `spctl` to check or re-enable Gatekeeper
Developer operations during internal app testing

name: Service stop via launchctl
description: Detects the execution of 'launchctl' to unload services, which is a common technique to disable security tools or agents.
query: aul.processImagePath:"launchctl" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.xpc.launchctl" AND aul.formatString:"launchctl %{public}s: %s" AND (aul.eventMessage:"launchctl unload: <private>")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate system administration (Software uninstallations)

name: Internal Defacement via osascript
description: Detects AppleScript (osascript) modifying system preferences (CFPrefs). Note that specific keys/values are redacted as <private>.
query: aul.processImagePath:"osascript" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.defaults" AND aul.formatString:"setting new value %{private}@ for key %{private}@ in %{public}@"
author: Eram
false_positives: High possibility of false positives from legitimate automation scripts.

name: System Shutdown Reboot via shutdown
description: Detects the execution of the shutdown command via /sbin/shutdown, which forces the system to halt or restart.
query: aul.processImagePath:"shutdown" AND aul.formatString:"%s by %s: %s" AND (aul.eventMessage:"reboot by")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate system maintenance by administrators

name: Inhibit system recovery via timemachine
description: Detects the deletion of Time Machine local snapshots via tmutil or backupd, which is a common behavior of ransomware to inhibit system recovery.
query: aul.processImagePath:"backupd" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.TimeMachine" AND aul.formatString:"%{public}@" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Deleted Time Machine local snapshot with name")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate administration activity (System cleanup by user)
Automatic snapshot pruning by macOS system

name: Network Sniffing via tcpdump
description: It is possible to detect the use of the tcpdump command to monitor network traffic.
query: aul.processImagePath:"mDNSResponder" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.mDNSResponder" AND aul.formatString:"[R%u] DNSServiceCreateConnection START PID[%d](%{public}s)" AND (aul.eventMessage:"tcpdump")
author: Eram
false_positives: A network administrator may use it for network troubleshooting, security analysis, and similar purposes.

name: Brute Force via ssh
description: Detection of failed SSH password attempts.
query: aul.processImagePath:"sshd-session" AND aul.formatString:"%.500s" AND (aul.eventMessage:"error: maximum authentication attempts exceeded for")
author: Eram
false_positives: An administrator may mistype the password when connecting remotely.

name: Credentials from Password Stores via security
description: Observes processes executing security dump-keychain
query: aul.processImagePath:"security" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.securityd" AND aul.formatString:"DatabaseSession::DbOpen: dbName %s" AND (aul.eventMessage:"login.keychain-db")
author: Eram
false_positives: Accessible when an administrator inspects Keychain-stored credentials for security auditing purposes.

name: Phishing Spearphishing Attachment
description: A technique where adversaries send emails with malicious attachments to specific targets to gain code execution via user interaction.
query: aul.processImagePath:"CoreServicesUIAgent" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.launchservices" AND aul.formatString:"LAUNCH: Successful launched 0x%{public}x-0x%{public}x pid=%d %{public}@ %{public}@ '%{private}@'"
author: EunJunPark

name: External Remote Services
description: Adversaries gain initial access by using valid credentials to log into legitimate, external-facing remote services such as VPN, SSH, or VNC.
query: aul.processImagePath:"screensharingd" AND aul.formatString:"%s" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Authentication: SUCCEEDED")
author: EunJunPark

name: Boot or Logon Initialization Scripts
description: A technique where adversaries abuse the legacy macOS initialization mechanism LoginHook to execute malicious scripts automatically upon user login for persistence.
query: aul.processImagePath:"cfprefsd" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.defaults" AND aul.formatString:"Process %{public}d (%{public}s) wrote the key(s) %{public}s in { %{public}s, %{public}s, %{public}s, %{public}s, managed: %d }" AND (aul.eventMessage:"LoginHook in { com.apple.loginwindow, root, kCFPreferencesAnyHost,")
author: EunJunPark

name: Cron
description: Detects cron executing a user command matching known path or pattern.
query:
aul.processImagePath:"crontab" AND aul.formatString:"(%s) %s (%s)
" AND (aul.eventMessage:"END EDIT")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate scheduled jobs (system or user cron entries) such as backups or maintenance scripts.

name: Valid Accounts via sudo
description: An attacker who has compromised an account may perform actions that require root privileges—installing tools, creating accounts, deleting logs—in rapid succession; during such activity the frequency and pattern of sudo invocations will differ from normal.
query: aul.processImagePath:"sudo" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve User by ID")
author: Eram
false_positives: An administrator can access the system with sudo privileges.

name: External Remote Services via ssh
description: Detects a successful SSH login event on macOS. This is identified by the 'sshd-session' process logging an 'Accepted' message to the Apple Unified Log (AUL), indicating an external remote service was successfully accessed.
query: aul.processImagePath:"sshd-session" AND aul.formatString:"main bundle %{public}@ getting handle %p" AND (aul.eventMessage:"main bundle CFBundle ")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate SSH logins by administrators or users.

name: Boot or Logon Autostart Execution
description: A technique where adversaries configure "Login Items" settings to automatically execute malicious programs upon user login to establish persistence.
query: aul.processImagePath:"backgroundtaskmanagementd" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.backgroundtaskmanagement" AND aul.formatString:"SFLClient.addURL: url=%{public}@ type=%{public}@ global=%{bool}d managed=%{bool}d" AND (aul.eventMessage:"SFLClient.addURL:")
author: EunJunPark

name: Local Account via dscl
description: Detects the 'dscl' process executing a specific API call ('Create a new record in a node') which indicates a new local user account is being created on macOS.
query: aul.processImagePath:"dscl" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Create a new record in a node")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate administrator activity creating a new user account. (관리자의 정상적인 새 계정 생성)
Automated software installation (e.g., MDM) that creates service accounts. (서비스 계정을 생성하는 자동화된 소프트웨어 설치)

name: System Services
description: A technique where adversaries abuse launchctl, the macOS service management tool, to load malicious daemons or agents for code execution at startup or on demand.
query: aul.processImagePath:"launchctl" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.xpc.launchctl" AND aul.formatString:"launchctl %{public}s: %s" AND (aul.eventMessage:"launchctl load: <private>" OR aul.eventMessage:"launchctl bootstrap <private>")
author: EunJunPark

name: Scheduled Task/Job
description: A technique where adversaries abuse system job scheduling utilities, such as cron or launchd, to execute malicious code automatically at specific times or system startup.
query:
aul.processImagePath:"cron" AND aul.formatString:"(%s) %s (%s)
" AND (aul.eventMessage:"CMD (")
author: EunJunPark

name: User Execution Malicious File
description: The user runs a malicious file.
query: aul.processImagePath:"runningboardd" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.runningboard" AND aul.formatString:"Launch request for %{public}@[%d] is using uid %d (divined from auid %d euid %d)" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Launch request for app")
author: Eram
false_positives: This log cannot be determined.

name: Lateral Tool Transfer via scp
description: Detects the execution of 'sftp-server', which is initiated by 'sshd' when a client performs an SCP or SFTP file transfer
query: aul.processImagePath:"sftp-server" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve User by ID")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate use of scp or sftp by users and administrators for file transfers.

name: VNC
description: Detects VNC (Screen Sharing) connection attempts by monitoring Apple Unified Log (AUL) for 'screensharingd' logs that register a "viewer IP address".
query: aul.processImagePath:"screensharingd" AND aul.formatString:"viewer IP address %s  family %d" AND (aul.eventMessage:"viewer IP address <private>  family")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate use of VNC or Screen Sharing by users or administrators.

name: Taint Shared Content via smb
description: Detects incoming SMB connections to shared folders on macOS by monitoring 'smbd' logs. This event ('bind_tree') indicates a user successfully connected to a specific share path.
query: aul.processImagePath:"smbd" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.smb" AND aul.formatString:"%s: %s connected to path %s" AND (aul.eventMessage:"bind_tree: <private> connected to path <private>")
author: Eram
false_positives: Legitimate file sharing activity between employees.
Scheduled backups utilizing SMB shares.

name: Exfiltration Over C2 Channel via rsync
description: Detects potential data exfiltration over an SSH-based command-and-control channel using rsync.
query: aul.processImagePath:"symptomsd" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.symptomsd" AND aul.formatString:"Flow data on entry is %@" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Flow data on entry is ssh" AND aul.eventMessage:"(close)")
author: june0320
false_positives: Legitimate administrative rsync usage for backups or file

name: Exfiltration Over C2 Channel via curl
description: Detects curl process successfully initializing network settings and verifying network path satisfaction via Apple Unified Log. This indicates active network usage by curl.
query: aul.processImagePath:"curl" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve User by ID")
author: Eram

name: Automated Exfiltration via nc
description: Detects the execution of Netcat (nc) on macOS, a tool potentially used for automated data exfiltration (T1020) or C2 channels.
query: aul.processImagePath:"nc" AND (aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve User by ID")
author: Eram

name: Exfiltration Over Unencrypted Non C2 Protocol via Bluetooth
description: Transfer files in an unencrypted format over a non-C2 protocol, leaving the data's content visible to network inspection.
query: aul.processImagePath:"bluetoothd" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.bluetooth" AND aul.formatString:"Sending XPC message "%{public}s" to session "%{public}s"" AND (aul.eventMessage:"CBClassicMsgIdStateUpdated" AND aul.eventMessage:"com.apple.BluetoothFileExchange")
author: Eram

name: Exfiltration Over C2 Channel via curl
description: Detects curl process successfully initializing network settings and verifying network path satisfaction via Apple Unified Log. This indicates active network usage by curl.
query: aul.processImagePath:"curl" AND aul.subsystem:"com.apple.network.libinfo" AND aul.formatString:"nat64_v4_requires_synthesis(%{network:in_addr}d) == %{bool}d" AND (aul.eventMessage:"== false")
author: Eram
